comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
@piquark6046 , Hi. I'm member of TMAP.

Because TMAP can only be used in Korea, you may not be able to reproduce it.
"frontman.tmobiapi.com" is blocked, so OUR users are unable to log-in to our app.

Please tell me why AdBlock "frontman.tmobiapi.com". This is a URL that has nothing to do with advertising.

comment.body:
답변 감사합니다. 한글로 답변이 가능하신것으로 보여 한글로 남기겠습니다.

TMAP은 총3가지의 로그인방식을 사용하는데 지금 말씀하신 2가지 방식은 로그인에 문제가 없습니다. 다만  실명인증된 전화번호는 frontman.tmobiapi.com 을 타고 실명인증을 하는 로그인을 하게 됩니다.  frontman.tmobiapi.com 을 타지 못하니 #1577003 과 같은 발생하지 않아야하는 error 가 나오는 것입니다. frontman.tmobiapi.com 은 광고와 무관한 저희 회사의 g/w 서버입니다.

또한 지금 애드가드 사용자들이 가장 컴플레인을 하고 있는 부분은 최하단 탭의 "운전점수" page로 진입하지 못하는 것입니다. 해당 page가 TMAP에서 가장 많은 사용자가 방문하는 페이지입니다. 지금 애드가드를 사용하는 사용자 약 500여건이 접수되었으며 저희에게 이 부분은 컴플레인하고 있습니다.

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/140131845/9488a3b8-a608-4bdc-a008-c563a1a432fb)

@skkim-mobile I don't understand your meaning. I live in South Korea and have a citizenship of South Korea.
Therefore, I can sign up and sign in with SKT ID and a phone number.
During the registration process with the blocking rule on Android, I cannot face the incorrect blocking issue.

There is a difference between the following screenshots:

<details><summary>With the blocking rule</summary>

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.bihann.com/cast/672.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bihann.com%2Fcast%2F672.html) ### Comment > #156301 > @Sergey-Lyapin > > Thanks for addressing this issue. > > I disabled the DNS settings and it worked fine for nehannn.com. However, it does not work on bihann.com. A blank screen appears when I tap on it. > > I checked the AdGuard filter to see if there was any difference between nehannn.com and bihann.com. As a result, I found the following rules only for nehannn.com. I changed the domain of these rules to bihann.com and added them to the user rules and it worked fine for bihann.com. > > in Tracking Protection filter > @@||google-analytics.com/analytics.js$domain=nehannn.com > > in Japanese filter > @@||amazon-adsystem.com/aax2/apstag.js$domain=nehannn.com > @@||g.doubleclick.net/gampad/ads?$xmlhttprequest,domain=nehannn.com > @@||g.doubleclick.net/gpt/pubads_impl_$script,domain=nehannn.com > @@||g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js$domain=nehannn.com > @@||googlesyndication.com/pagead/managed/js/adsense/*/show_ads_impl_$script,domain=nehannn.com > @@||googlesyndication.com/safeframe/$subdocument,domain=nehannn.com > @@||pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js$domain=nehannn.com > nehannn.com#@#[id^="google_ads_iframe"] ### Screenshots

Try to leave only them, clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).
